definition: El Niño (meteorology)/Holy Infant (cf biblical nativity story)
La Niña (counterpart of El Niño in meteorology)

sentences.english: We see a livelier and a better Fernando every day.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在看到的是一个更好更阳光的圣婴。

sentences.english: Oxen lowing, little knowing Christ the Babe is Lord of all.
sentences.chinese: 牛群呜叫，不知道基督圣婴是万有主。

sentences.english: Come and behold Him, Born the King of Angels;
sentences.chinese: 来朝见圣婴，天使君王降生。

sentences.english: Whether a relatively weak La Niña condition will be occurring over the spring 2009 still remains to watch.
sentences.chinese: 今年春季是否会出现弱反圣婴现象，尚待进一步观察。

definition: God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
feudal term of praise for ruler, king or emperor/general term for saint in former times/term for God during the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom 太平天國|太平天国/Holy Spirit (in Christian Trinity)
the Emperor's body/Jesus' body/communion wafer (in Christian mass)
Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)
Holy Son/Jesus Christ/God the Son (in the Christian Trinity)
the Magi/the Three Wise Kings from the East in the biblical nativity story
lit. to descend to earth (of an immortal)/to be born
icon/iconic/religious image/figure (of Confucius, Buddha, Jesus Christ, the Virgin Mary etc)/CL:張|张[zhang1]
